glyph.name: Sacred Listening
glyph.description: Deep, empathetic listening that creates space for truth and healing to emerge.
glyph.practice: Listen with your whole being. Hear beyond words. Hold space for what wants to emerge.

interpretation:
A dark, still pool reflects the stars.
A single silver drop falls without sound.
Ripples of liquid light expand to the shore.
visualPhrases: A dark, still pool reflects the stars.
A single silver drop falls without sound.
Ripples of liquid light expand to the shore.
